name: Luxury Fitness & Beauty
overview:
Luxury Fitness & Beautyâ„¢ is a brand new exclusive organization, working on behalf of a discerning subscription-based clientele, to compile the finest products and services from the following business sectors:

Travel & Hospitality, Sports & Leisure, Health & Fitness, Spa & Beauty

Luxury Fitness & Beautyâ„¢ is unique insofar that it only includes members that have either been invited to join following a professional endorsement from one of their network of LF&B â€˜Spiesâ€™ to personal recommendations by one of their subscribers, or have had their application accepted after thorough review.

From Hotels with Leisure Facilities to Spas & Health Resorts to Personal Trainers & Yoga Teachers, LF&B will be gradually populating its lists with the most exclusive brands from both large and small Member organizations. These can be found in either the Directory or the Luxury Collection â€“a full E-Brochure of its most prestigious organizations.
